title: Unable to purchase Riot Points with Valid Visa Card
body:
Hey guys

I have used this Visa card before and purchased a few skins.  Even just 2 months ago.

However as of these past 2 weeks all attempts at purchasing riot points results in a:

"Error Unable to perform this transaction..... please contact your card provider"  (or something along those lines)

Cant remember the full error, and when I try to recreate the error I get:

"Error you have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time.  Please wait 24 hours and try again"

I just used this Visa card after these errors and have managed to make purchases from Ebay and AliExpress.

Any technical support, ideas?  Would not want to miss out on the mystery discounted skins I received :)

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)? They're the only ones who are able to deal with billing related issues.
